Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller.commands.normalCommands

Class ShiftResourcesCommand

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.commands.normalCommands.NormalActionCommand
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.commands.normalCommands.ShiftResourcesCommand
All Implemented Interfaces:
Command
public class ShiftResourcesCommand
extends NormalActionCommand
this class represent the shift command. in particular, during the turn, a player can shift the resources into his warehouse in every way that he wants when the shift his limited to the normal shelves, can shift only resources with compatible shelves moving one resource at time when one of the shelves selected is a leader shelf

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    ShiftResourcesCommand​(int source, int destination)
    this constructor crete the object starting from the two shelves to shift

    • executeCommand

      public ResponseToClient executeCommand​(java.util.List<CommandName> possibleCommands, ClientHandler client, java.util.List<CommandName> previousPossibleCommands)
      this method execute the command given in input, returning a message that will be sent to the client. the method will change the internal model state depending on the dynamic type of the commandInterpreter
      Parameters:
      possibleCommands - these are the possible commands to eventually modify
      client - this is the handler to notify in case of a internal state change
      previousPossibleCommands - these are the possible commands referred to the previous command, that eventually may be modified
      Returns:
      the response to send to the client\s
